A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: NOT a fanboy here. Simply put\, the whole story is rushed\, badly edited\, and the general evolution of the characters is really approximate\, generic\, (again) rushed\, shallow. It feels like huge things are coming\, and then nothing really happens. Some really stupid things here there (flying characters and sudden deaths)\, some explanations that will never given (read: what do we do with this character? Mmm don't know\, let's kill him so it's done) Simply unconvincing. A huge\, huge letdown.
